tools.name: Canva for Education
tools.summary: Create professional presentations, posters, and visual resources with drag-and-drop design tools.
tools.notes: Free premium features for verified educators and schools.

tools.name: Google Workspace for Education
tools.summary: Suite of productivity tools including Gmail, Docs, Drive, and Classroom for schools.
tools.notes: Free fundamentals tier available for qualifying institutions.

tools.name: Every Budget Builder
tools.summary: School budget planning and forecasting tool with scenario modelling.
tools.notes: Check if your MAT or LA has a subscription.

tools.name: Schoolbus
tools.summary: Safeguarding and compliance resources including model policies and updates.

tools.name: Widgit Online
tools.summary: Create symbol-supported resources for learners with communication needs.
tools.notes: Free trial available; check for LA licensing.

tools.name: Microsoft Immersive Reader
tools.summary: Free reading tool with text-to-speech, line focus, and translation built into Microsoft products.
tools.notes: Built into Word, OneNote, Teams, and Edge browser.

tools.name: Twinkl
tools.summary: Thousands of curriculum-aligned teaching resources, worksheets, and display materials.
tools.notes: Free resources available; subscription unlocks full library.

tools.name: SmartSurvey
tools.summary: UK-based survey tool for staff, parent, and pupil voice data collection.

tools.name: The Key HR Templates
tools.summary: HR policy templates, model contracts, and employment guidance for schools.
tools.notes: Some content free; full access via subscription.

tools.name: GOV.UK Condition Data Collection
tools.summary: Government programme providing free building condition surveys for maintained schools.
tools.notes: Check eligibility based on school type and region.

tools.name: HSE Risk Assessment Template
tools.summary: Official HSE risk assessment templates and worked examples for common school activities.
tools.notes: Covers trips, events, and general workplace hazards.

tools.name: Analyse School Performance (ASP)
tools.summary: DfE tool for analysing pupil attainment, progress, and absence data against national benchmarks.
tools.notes: Access via DfE Sign-in; essential for SEF and Ofsted prep.
